title: Wtf was that frisking?
content: How are people okay with the way frisking happened in AT? The volunteers literally touched every single part and yes i mean every single part and asked us to do weird shit like spread your legs like wtf. This isn't even done for ESAs. Bro conveniently asked "Do I have your consent" after frisking everywhere, and i didn't even consent to that shit. It was extremely uncomfortable.

comments.body: Seeing all these AT posts Iâ€™m so glad I didnâ€™t waste my time going

AT Volunteers breathes**
10 posts on reddit 
ðŸ‘¾Too many issues regarding volunteers I think u guys should definitely report it to Dean of students at this point to ensure next year they implement some strict rules during recruitment of volunteers
They checked me for 2-3min atleast like bro u ain't finding shit even if you tickle my balls cuz I don't have anything

Some volunteer opened my wallet, took all the money out, asked me if I have condoms in my wallet(why would I bring that to a concert my brother in Christ), basically removed all the cards and checked, but didn't put anything back into my wallet and free handed me my shit back, like bro i get it u gotta frisk and all, but c'mon man tf
Same here, thank god I didn't go just to get blueballed multiple times
Glad that I didnt come to AT this year
